title: Fix and stabilize all tools across the DocMasterTools platform

requirements.summary: Audit and fix all 16 PDF tool components to ensure correct AdvancedToolShell workflow, settings panel rendering, Apply & Preview functionality, and Download button state management
acceptanceCriteria: Every PDF tool page renders without JavaScript errors in the browser console.
Every PDF tool shows its settings panel before any processing begins.
Clicking 'Apply & Preview' in each PDF tool produces a visible preview or output summary.
The Download button in each PDF tool is disabled until a preview has been generated.
After a successful download, 'Back to Home' and 'Use Another Tool' navigation buttons appear.

file_operations.description: Fix the BasePDFTool component to ensure proper AdvancedToolShell integration: verify settings panel renders before processing, Apply & Preview triggers client-side processing and shows preview/output summary, Download button is disabled until preview is confirmed, and PostDownloadNavigation appears after successful download. Fix any broken props, missing imports, or state management issues.

Fix PDFMergeTool to use AdvancedToolShell workflow correctly: ensure file list management works, settings panel renders all controls, Apply & Preview merges PDFs client-side and shows preview, Download button enables only after preview, and navigation buttons appear post-download. Fix any broken file handling or missing imports.

Fix PDFSplitTool to ensure page range input renders correctly, Apply & Preview splits the PDF and shows output summary, Download button is disabled before preview, and per-file download buttons work. Fix any broken page range parsing or state management.

Fix PDFCompressTool to ensure automatic/manual compression mode selector works, quality slider renders and responds, Apply & Preview compresses the PDF and shows size reduction preview, and Download button enables after preview. Fix any broken compression logic or UI controls.

Fix PDFToImageTool to ensure format selector (PNG/JPG) renders, Apply & Preview converts PDF to images and shows preview grid, Download as ZIP button works, and navigation buttons appear. Fix any broken canvas operations or JSZip integration.

Fix ImageToPDFTool to ensure multiple image upload works, image list displays with reordering controls, Apply & Preview generates PDF preview, and Download button enables after preview. Fix any broken PDF generation or image ordering logic.

Fix PDFPasswordProtectTool (BasePDFTool wrapper) to ensure password input field renders, Apply & Preview simulates password protection and shows confirmation, and Download button works. Fix any missing prop mappings or broken UI.

Fix PDFPasswordUnlockTool (BasePDFTool wrapper) to ensure password input field renders, Apply & Preview simulates unlock and shows success message, and Download button works. Fix any missing prop mappings or broken UI.

Fix PDFAddWatermarkTool (BasePDFTool wrapper) to ensure watermark text input and positioning controls render, Apply & Preview shows watermarked preview, and Download button works. Fix any missing settings panel configuration.

Fix PDFAddPageNumbersTool (BasePDFTool wrapper) to ensure page number format and position selectors render, Apply & Preview shows numbered preview, and Download button works. Fix any missing settings configuration.

Fix PDFOCRTool (BasePDFTool wrapper) to ensure language selector renders, Apply & Preview simulates OCR processing and shows text extraction preview, and Download button works. Fix any missing settings or broken preview display.

Fix PDFPageCounterTool (BasePDFTool wrapper) to ensure Apply & Preview counts pages and displays the count in preview area, and Download button produces a text report. Fix any broken counting logic or output generation.

Fix PDFRemoveBlankPagesTool (BasePDFTool wrapper) to ensure sensitivity threshold slider renders, Apply & Preview detects and removes blank pages and shows removal summary, and Download button works. Fix any missing settings or broken detection logic.

Fix PDFReorderTool (BasePDFTool wrapper) to ensure page reordering controls render, Apply & Preview shows reordered page preview, and Download button works. Fix any missing drag-and-drop or page list UI.

Fix PDFSignTool (BasePDFTool wrapper) to ensure signature image upload and position selector render, Apply & Preview shows signed PDF preview, and Download button works. Fix any missing signature placement UI.

Fix PDFToWordTool (BasePDFTool wrapper) to ensure Apply & Preview simulates PDF to Word conversion and shows conversion status, and Download button produces a .docx file. Fix any broken conversion simulation.

requirements.summary: Audit and fix all 16 image tool pages to ensure AdvancedToolShell workflow is fully operational: file upload, settings panel, Apply & Preview with before/after comparison, and Download button state
acceptanceCriteria: Every image tool page renders without JavaScript errors.
File upload (drag-and-drop and click-to-select) functions correctly on all image tool pages.
Settings panel controls (presets, sliders, unit selectors, toggles) all respond to user interaction.
Clicking 'Apply & Preview' produces a before/after comparison showing original vs processed image with dimensions and file size.
Download button is disabled before preview and enabled after preview.
Batch upload mode shows per-file status (pending, processing, done, error) and allows individual or ZIP download.

file_operations.description: Fix PassportPhotoMakerPage to ensure PhotoResizeTool component renders with all passport photo presets (India, US, UK, Schengen, Canada), file upload works, preset selection applies correct dimensions, Apply & Preview shows before/after comparison, and Download button enables after preview. Fix any broken preset configuration or imports from frontend/src/lib/imageProcessing.ts.

Fix AadhaarPhotoResizePage to ensure PhotoResizeTool renders with Aadhaar presets (200×200, 480×640), all settings controls work, Apply & Preview produces correct output, and Download button functions. Fix any broken preset mappings or canvas operations.

Fix PANPhotoResizePage to ensure PhotoResizeTool renders with PAN card presets (NSDL, UTIITSL), settings panel works, Apply & Preview shows comparison, and Download works. Fix any broken preset configuration.

Fix SSCPhotoResizePage to ensure PhotoResizeTool renders with SSC exam presets (CGL, CHSL, MTS, GD), all controls respond, Apply & Preview works, and Download enables correctly. Fix any missing preset definitions.

Fix RailwayPhotoResizePage to ensure PhotoResizeTool renders with Railway exam presets (RRB NTPC, Group D, ALP), settings work, Apply & Preview produces comparison, and Download functions. Fix any broken preset data.

Fix PoliceArmyPhotoPage to ensure PhotoResizeTool renders with Police/Army/CAPF presets, all controls function, Apply & Preview shows before/after, and Download works. Fix any missing presets or imports.

Fix VisaPhotoResizePage to ensure PhotoResizeTool renders with visa presets (US, UK, Schengen, Canada, Australia), settings respond, Apply & Preview works, and Download enables. Fix any broken preset configuration.

Fix SignatureResizePage to ensure PhotoResizeTool renders with signature presets (Aadhaar, PAN, exam applications), controls work, Apply & Preview produces output, and Download functions. Fix any missing signature-specific presets.

Fix ImageCompressorPage to ensure file upload works, quality slider renders and responds, format selector (JPEG/PNG/WebP) functions, target file size input works, batch mode displays BatchFileQueue correctly, Apply & Preview compresses images and shows size reduction comparison, and Download/Download All as ZIP work. Fix any broken compression logic from frontend/src/lib/imageProcessing.ts or JSZip integration.

Fix ImageCropperPage to ensure file upload works, aspect ratio presets render, custom crop region inputs (pixels/percentage) function, Apply & Preview shows cropped output with original comparison, and Download works. Fix any broken canvas crop operations.

Fix DPIChangerPage to ensure file upload works, DPI preset buttons render, custom DPI input functions, batch mode works with BatchFileQueue, Apply & Preview changes DPI metadata and shows confirmation, and Download/ZIP download work. Fix any broken DPI metadata operations.

Fix CustomImageResizePage to ensure all resize modes render correctly (easy presets, percentage, dimensions, file size, print, social media), unit conversion works (px/cm/mm/inches), aspect ratio lock toggles correctly, batch mode functions, Apply & Preview shows resized comparison, and Download/ZIP download work. Fix any broken unit conversion or social media preset logic.

Fix JPGToPNGPage to ensure file upload works, format selector (PNG/WebP) renders, quality slider functions, target file size input works, batch mode displays BatchFileQueue, Apply & Preview converts format and shows comparison, and Download/ZIP download work. Fix any broken format conversion from frontend/src/lib/imageProcessing.ts.

Fix PNGToJPGPage to ensure file upload works, format selector (JPEG/WebP) renders, quality and target size controls function, batch mode works, Apply & Preview converts and shows comparison, and Download/ZIP download work. Fix any broken PNG to JPEG conversion.

Fix WEBPConverterPage to ensure file upload works, format selector (WebP/JPEG/PNG) renders, quality controls function, batch mode displays BatchFileQueue correctly, Apply & Preview converts and shows comparison with file sizes, and Download/ZIP download work. Fix any broken WebP conversion logic.

Fix BackgroundRemoverPage to ensure file upload works, background mode selector (transparent/white/custom color/blur) renders, color picker functions, batch mode works with BatchFileQueue, Apply & Preview removes background via canvas flood-fill and shows transparent PNG comparison, and Download/ZIP download produce valid PNG files. Fix any broken canvas operations or missing utility imports from frontend/src/lib/imageProcessing.ts.

Fix the shared PhotoResizeTool component to ensure preset selector renders all provided presets, unit conversion (px/cm/mm/inches) works correctly, aspect ratio lock toggles properly, quality slider responds, target file size compression functions, Apply & Preview produces before/after comparison with dimensions and sizes, and Download button enables only after preview. Fix any broken unit conversion logic, canvas resize operations, or state management issues.

requirements.summary: Audit and fix SmartDocumentFixerPage and all sub-components to ensure upload, preview, auto enhancements, export, and freemium gating all function correctly
acceptanceCriteria: SmartDocumentFixerPage loads without console errors.
Image upload via drag-and-drop or click works and populates the BeforeAfterPreviewPanel.
Auto White Background, Auto Compress, and Multi-Copy Layout toggles produce correct canvas output when 'Apply & Preview' is clicked.
HD JPG, PNG, A4 PDF, and Multi-Photo Sheet downloads all produce downloadable files.
Free users see watermark overlay, fix counter, and locked/blurred Pro features.
Pro users (activated via ProPricingModal demo button) see no watermark and all features unlocked.
ProPricingModal opens on 'Go Pro' click, renders pricing table, and closes correctly.

file_operations.description: Fix SmartDocumentFixerPage to ensure drag-and-drop upload works, before/after preview renders via BeforeAfterPreviewPanel, Auto Enhancements panel (AutoFeaturesPanel) renders with all checkboxes functional, export panel (ExportOptionsPanel) renders all download buttons, freemium gating displays fix counter and watermark for free users using useProAccess hook, Pro users see unlocked features without watermark, and ProPricingModal opens/closes correctly on 'Go Pro' click. Fix any broken component imports, state management issues, or localStorage integration.

Fix BeforeAfterPreviewPanel to ensure original and processed images display side-by-side, zoom controls work, rotation buttons function, crop guide overlay toggles correctly, watermark controls render for Pro features, and dimensions/file sizes display accurately. Fix any broken canvas operations or missing prop handling.

Fix AutoFeaturesPanel to ensure Auto White Background checkbox triggers flood-fill canvas operation correctly, Auto Compress checkbox reduces file size to target KB via iterative quality reduction, Multi-Copy Layout checkbox generates 2×2 grid on A4 canvas, and all three features apply when 'Apply & Preview' is clicked. Fix any broken canvas logic or missing imports from frontend/src/lib/imageProcessing.ts.

Fix ExportOptionsPanel to ensure HD JPG, PNG, WebP, A4 PDF, and Multi-Photo Sheet download buttons all produce valid downloadable files, Pro-gated options show lock/blur for free users, and pure-JS PDF generation works without external libraries. Fix any broken download logic or Pro access gating.

Fix AutoPhotoSizeGenerator to ensure preset selector renders all photo presets, custom dimension inputs work, canvas resizing applies correct dimensions and compression, and output matches file size requirements. Fix any broken preset mappings or compression logic from frontend/src/lib/imageProcessing.ts.

Fix ProPricingModal to ensure modal opens on trigger, pricing table displays ₹399/month and ₹3000/year correctly, feature comparison table renders, activation demo button updates useProAccess hook state, and modal closes on outside click or close button. Fix any broken modal state or useProAccess integration.

requirements.summary: Audit and fix AIDocumentEnhancerPage to ensure Pro gating, authentication check, Pro Active badge, ProPricingModal integration, and routing all work correctly
acceptanceCriteria: Navigating to /ai-document-enhancer renders the page without errors.
Non-Pro and unauthenticated users see the login/subscription gate with pricing.
Authenticated Pro users (useProAccess isPro=true + useInternetIdentity isAuthenticated=true) see the unlocked tool view and 'Pro Active' badge.
ProPricingModal shows ₹399/month and ₹3000/year pricing.
App.tsx routes /ai-document-enhancer using React.lazy and Suspense.

file_operations.description: Fix AIDocumentEnhancerPage to ensure the page renders without errors, login/subscription gate displays correctly for unauthenticated or non-Pro users using useInternetIdentity and useProAccess hooks, authenticated Pro users see the unlocked tool view with feature cards (AI enhancement, text clarity, noise removal), 'Pro Active' badge appears for Pro users, and ProPricingModal integration shows correct pricing (₹399/month, ₹3000/year) with proper open/close functionality. Fix any broken hook integration, conditional rendering, or missing imports.

Fix App.tsx to ensure /ai-document-enhancer route is correctly registered using React.lazy and Suspense, resolves to AIDocumentEnhancerPage component, and renders without blank screen or 404. Verify all other tool routes (image tools, PDF tools, resume builder) are correctly registered with lazy imports and Suspense fallbacks. Fix any missing route mappings or broken lazy import paths.

requirements.summary: Audit and fix Resume Builder pages to ensure template selection, multi-step form wizard, live preview, color theme selection, PDF download, and auto-save all function correctly
acceptanceCriteria: ResumeBuilderPage at /resume-builder renders all 14 template cards without errors.
Clicking a template navigates to /resume-builder/[slug] and loads ResumeTemplateBuilderPage.
All form wizard steps (Personal Info, Education, Experience, Skills, Projects, Certifications, Languages, Achievements, References) render and accept input.
Live preview updates as form fields are filled.
Color theme selector applies chosen palette to the preview.
Download PDF produces a downloadable A4 PDF file.
Draft data persists in localStorage on navigation away and restores on return.

file_operations.description: Fix ResumeBuilderPage to ensure all 14 resume template cards render correctly (7 Indian + 7 International templates), each card displays template name, category, description, and thumbnail, clicking a card navigates to /resume-builder/[template-slug] using the onNavigate callback, SEO metadata is set correctly, and breadcrumb navigation renders. Fix any missing template card entries, broken navigation callbacks, or incorrect template data from frontend/src/data/resumeTemplateConfigs.ts.

Fix ResumeTemplateBuilderPage to ensure the page extracts template slug from URL, loads template config from frontend/src/data/resumeTemplateConfigs.ts, renders ResumeFormWizard with all form steps functional, displays ResumePreview with live updates as form data changes, color theme selector (ColorThemeSelector) applies themes to preview, Download PDF button produces valid A4 PDF, and auto-save to localStorage works on form data changes. Fix any broken template loading, form-to-preview binding, PDF generation, or localStorage persistence.

Fix ResumeFormWizard to ensure all form steps render in correct order (Personal Info, Education, Experience, Skills, Projects, Certifications, Languages, Achievements, References), step navigation (Previous/Next) works correctly, progress indicator shows current step accurately, each form component (PersonalInfoForm, EducationForm, ExperienceForm, SkillsForm, ProjectsForm, CertificationsForm, LanguagesForm, AchievementsForm, ReferencesForm) renders without errors, form data updates propagate to parent component, and mobile accordion layout works below 768px. Fix any broken step transitions, missing form imports, or state management issues.

Fix ResumePreview to ensure live preview renders all resume sections (personal info, education, experience, skills, projects, certifications, languages, achievements, references), color theme applies correctly using CSS variables from selected theme, Download PDF button triggers PDF generation without errors, toast notifications display on download success/failure, and preview updates in real-time as form data changes. Fix any broken section rendering, theme application, PDF generation, or toast integration.

Fix PersonalInfoForm to ensure all input fields render (name, phone, email, summary), photo upload works, Indian phone number formatting applies, AI-generated professional summary button functions correctly, and form data updates propagate to parent. Fix any broken file upload, summary generation from frontend/src/lib/summaryGenerator.ts, or input validation.

Fix EducationForm to ensure users can add/remove education entries, all fields render (institution, degree, field, dates, grade), date inputs work correctly, and form data updates propagate. Fix any broken add/remove logic or input handling.

Fix ExperienceForm to ensure users can add/remove experience entries, all fields render (company, position, dates, current job checkbox, description), 'Currently Working' checkbox disables end date, and form data updates. Fix any broken add/remove or date handling logic.

Fix SkillsForm to ensure users can add/remove skill entries, skill name input and proficiency selector render, proficiency levels (Expert to Beginner) work, and form data updates. Fix any broken add/remove or selector logic.
Fix ProjectsForm to ensure users can add/remove project entries, all fields render (title, description, technologies, link), and form data updates propagate. Fix any broken add/remove logic.
Fix CertificationsForm to ensure users can add/remove certification entries, all fields render (name, issuer, date), and form data updates. Fix any broken add/remove or date handling.
Fix LanguagesForm to ensure users can add/remove language entries, language name input and proficiency selector render (Native to Basic), and form data updates. Fix any broken add/remove logic.
Fix AchievementsForm to ensure users can add/remove achievement entries, title and description inputs render, and form data updates propagate. Fix any broken add/remove logic.
Fix ReferencesForm to ensure users can add/remove reference entries, all fields render (name, position, company, phone, email), and form data updates. Fix any broken add/remove or validation logic.

Fix ColorThemeSelector to ensure theme swatches render in a grid, clicking a swatch highlights it and applies the theme to preview via callback, currently selected theme is visually indicated, and themes from frontend/src/lib/colorThemes.ts are correctly loaded. Fix any broken selection logic or theme application.

requirements.summary: Audit and fix App.tsx routing to ensure all routes are correctly registered, lazy imports resolve, Suspense boundaries work, and language-prefixed routes function
acceptanceCriteria: Every defined route renders its correct page component without a blank screen or 404.
All React.lazy imports resolve without import errors.
Suspense fallback renders during lazy load and is replaced by the page component on resolution.
Language-prefixed routes correctly extract the lang parameter and set the active language.
Direct URL navigation to any route (not just from the home page) works correctly.

file_operations.description: Fix App.tsx to ensure all routes are correctly registered in the routing state object, including /calculators and all /calculators/[slug] routes, /pdf-tools, /image-tools and all individual image tool routes, /resume-builder and all /resume-builder/[slug] routes, /smart-document-fixer, /ai-document-enhancer, and all language-prefixed variants (/:lang/calculators, /:lang/pdf-tools, /:lang/image-tools, /:lang/resume-builder). Verify all React.lazy imports point to correct component paths, Suspense fallback renders a loading indicator during lazy load, language-prefixed routes extract lang parameter and set it via LanguageContext, and direct URL navigation works without blank screens or 404s. Fix any missing route mappings, broken lazy import paths, or incorrect path parsing logic.

requirements.summary: Audit and fix Header and LanguageSelector components to ensure navigation links, mobile menu, language dropdown, language switching, and RTL layout all function correctly
acceptanceCriteria: Header renders all 6 navigation links in the specified order.
External links open in a new tab with rel='noopener noreferrer'.

Selecting Hindi switches UI text to Hindi translations without page reload.
Selecting Arabic sets dir='rtl' on the document root and mirrors layout correctly.

file_operations.description: Fix Header to ensure all 6 navigation links render in correct order (Calculator Hub, PDF Tools, Image Tools, Resume Builder, JobsIndiaa.com external, RJY Total Manpowers.com external), external links open in new tab with rel='noopener noreferrer', hamburger menu opens overlay on mobile, mobile menu closes on outside click or menu item selection, and LanguageSelector integration works. Fix any broken navigation callbacks, missing external link attributes, or faulty mobile menu toggle logic.

Fix LanguageSelector to ensure dropdown lists all 19 supported languages with correct native names or language codes, clicking a language updates LanguageContext state via setLanguage, language switching updates displayed UI text without page reload by loading translations from frontend/src/locales/[lang].json, selecting Arabic sets dir='rtl' on document root and applies RTL layout, language preference persists in localStorage, and dropdown closes on outside click. Fix any missing language entries, broken language switching logic, faulty RTL toggling, or localStorage integration issues.
